pageContext.claim: “They [Democrats] want to abolish ICE. They don't mind crime. They want higher taxes. They want to knock out your Medicare because they want to go socialist.”
pageContext.analysis: Some Democrats have been calling to abolish U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, but it’s not a widely held position and some Democrats say the agency should be reformed, not abolished. Democrats support Medicare and many believe it should be expanded.
